result.reason: Feature request to add RDP session listing (qwinsta/WTS API) similar to Remote Desktop Connection Manager, allowing users to see active sessions on a remote host before connecting
result.approach: Add a context-menu action on RDP connections that queries remote host sessions via WTS API (WTSEnumerateSessions P/Invoke) and displays them in a dialog, allowing the user to connect to or shadow an existing session

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"Feature request to add RDP session listing (qwinsta/WTS API) similar to Remote Desktop Connection Manager, allowing users to see active sessions on a remote host before connecting","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/RDP/RdpProtocol.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionTreeWindow.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/RDP/RdpSessionLister.cs"],"approach":"Add a context-menu action on RDP connections that queries remote host sessions via WTS API (WTSEnumerateSessions P/Invoke) and displays them in a dialog, allowing the user to connect to or shadow an existing session"}
